title: No chest for S- if a lobby member is punished
body:
As you know, if you're chat restricted or banned, you can't participate in the Hextech crafting. 
Unfortunately, there's a bug where your punishment extends to allies even if they're the one who got an S. 

**Situation:** Eligible player created a lobby with a player who was punished (not eligible for chests). **BOTH** Players receive S- scores.

**_Expected_ outcome**: Eligible player receives a chest for his **OWN** S-, but ineligible player does not.

**Bug:** Eligible player's S- is negated due to the ally in the lobby. No chest is rewarded, **BUT** the champion played still receives the can't-get-a-chest-again-with-this-champ border.

I can't/won't test this again to see if it always happens. Not only would it be difficult for the both of us to get S's again, but if it works I'd be down another champion to use without the reward. The risk is too high.

On a side note, I was so stoked to get Gentleman Cho'Gath as loot from a solo game, then the next three loots I got were Champions. 
TT-TT
